column5: The 808 Artistic Charmer: Romanced in the Heart of Alpine.   Purchasing this property and beginning to bring back the beauty of 808 has been a pure joy.   Built in the 1930s , The 808 Artistic Charmer is a sweet home with a respect of the Desert life and Art.   In the Formal Dining Room - I have an easel and paint for guest to be creative and share in their love for creativity!
column8: The 808 Artistic Charmer: Romanced in Alpine
